body.name: KOORUI Curved 27 Inch Gaming Monitor, Full HD 1080p R1800 165Hz VA Computer Monitor, 100% sRGB, Built-in Adaptive Sync, 1 x Display Port 1.2 & 2 x HDMI 1.4, Eye Care, VESA Compatible, Black 27E6C
deliveryMessages: This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.
features: 【 R1800 165Hz Gaming Monitor 】- KOORUI 27-inch curved gaming monitor, renowned for its ultra-smooth 165Hz delivers a seamlessly immersive visual experience, bringing your games to life with unparalleled fluidity. The 1800R curvature of this computer monitor enhances depth and dimension in your gameplay, ensuring flawlessly rendered angles for a truly captivating adventure.

【Dive Into the World of sRGB 100%】- Experience visual brilliance like never before with 27-inch Full HD (1920x1080) monitor. Powered by a VA panel, it offers a dynamic contrast ratio of 3000:1 and an impressive sRGB 100% color coverage. Revel in rich, vibrant colors that capture every nuance of your content, guaranteeing flawless color reproduction and intricate detail in every frame.

【 AdaptiveSync Technology 】- Elevate your gaming to the next level with this 27-inch gaming monitor.Monitor features AdaptiveSync Technology, ensuring a buttery-smooth, realistic gaming experience. It dynamically syncs the monitor's refresh rate with your image source, enhancing responsiveness and precision.Seamlessly smooth gameplay and say goodbye to screen tearing and stuttering,giving you the competitive edge you crave.

【 Connect Your Way 】- Equipped with two HDMI (v1.4) ports, DisplayPort 1.2 ports, and an audio out jack, it offers a multitude of connectivity options. Seamlessly link up your gaming console, and audio devices for a complete entertainment hub. The pc monitor even includes essential accessories like a 1.2-meter DP cable, power cord, adapter, stand, and user manual for quick and hassle-free setup.※ 165Hz with DP 1.2, 144Hz with HDMI 1.4 ※

【 KOORUI Services 】- We can provide high-quality computer monitors and premium services, including 3 years paid warranty. If you have any questions, you are welcome to contact us at any time, we are at your service 24 hours a day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I got exactly what I paid for.
reviews.reviewText: There's really not much to say for this monitor. It's got a thin frame, I set it up for a 144hz monitor so I could pull all the frames I wanted from my gaming PC. I average about 60-80 frames per second on Cyberpunk 2077 and this monitor can support up to 144hz - so picture quality is absolutely fine and smooth. Colors looked great out of the box and I've literally done nothing to adjust brightness or hue. The V-shaped monitor stand feels like it was angling the monitor to a down-angle and since I'm a tall guy I had to use little rubber block-erasers to prop and lean the monitor to a cozy angle for me. Highly satisfied for the price I paid, and so far no issues. Lets see how it holds up after a year or two.tl;drPaid a great price for a high refresh rate monitor. Works great with video gaming or watching movies. Easy to set up and only mild adjustments for monitor-stand. 5/5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Gaming!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this monitor for my boyfriend who wanted to play on a smaller screen. I had no idea what I was looking for, but with all the info this listing gives, it was a no brainer. The monitor itself is so clean looking, and the display is perfect. It also blocks blue light which I love - especially when I’m watching my boyfriend playing two inches away from the screen! He plugged his Xbox directly to the monitor and uses his headset - he’s obsessed with it. Highly recommend for gamers out there!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent monitor for the price! Picture is sharp, no defects, color is excellent, even out of the box. Mechanism to tilt the screen seems a little wonky but otherwise I’m very happy with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: KOORUI seem to be masters at knowing what people really care about in a monitor, stripping the spec down to that, and delivering at an incredible price.It's a VA panel, which is known for having a higher contrast ratio than the more common IP, but lower picture quality in general. This can be a problem and you must be careful buying VA' panels as some have very poor color, unclear images, and terrible viewing angle.This unit is VA but will full sRGB gamut color, a viewing angle that (to my eyes) is on a par with any IP that's in front of you on a desk, and respectable accuracy right out of the box. It sits right next to my BenQ and I can't really spot a difference in the color in most images.The most accurate color temperature, kind of surprisingly, seemed to come by setting the color to "custom", rather than the warm setting which is often the D65 target on consumer displays.A grayscale sweep showed about a max 4.5 dE error in the gray scales. That's not bad at all off the shelf, and typical for monitors not sold on reference color accuracy. Unfortunately it can't seem to be improved much by simply adjusting the RGB sliders which don't seem to give a very linear response. You need a calibration if you want to perfect it. Using DisplayCal I generated a gamma ramp which fixed the tone curve and grayscale errors. However, the color saturation appears a tad high, (which most people will LOVE).Bottom line is that you're getting an image typical of any decent consumer IP panel, maybe better that many of them in gamut coverage, which wouldn't be saying much - except it's VA. After calibration, (which tends to reduce contrast ratio), I have up towards 4000:1 contrast ratio. (IP panels are native ~1000:1 and usually calibrated lower).To be clear, most people using a monitor will enjoy a high contrast ratio more than any other attribute of the picture quality. (This has actually been demonstrated).It has a joystick for adjusting the settings which I find easier and more intuitive to use than the external puck on a BenQ. As a bonus it's not flopping around on my desk.It seems cheap in that it's light weight. Unless that means it's going to break, then it's only a bonus at this point since it makes it easier to setup and move around.I have no comment on any of the gaming or HDR features as I haven't explored those yet. But it's too late for anything to convince me I will ever see a better monitor for the price.EDIT: At review I had not noticed it had an sRGB mode. This brings the color gamut much closer to standard, (except red which is still a bit saturated).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my needs
reviews.reviewText: Great for my personal needs.If you are getting a monitor like this, high refresh rate and higher than FHD don't forget to double check your settings. I've seen a couple reviews that I think could have been solved by double checking this.But on to the monitor itself. It's great! Bought it at ~$170 USD. Played games at double the quoted refresh rate and also at 30 fps. I haven't seen any ghosting, though this can happen apparently I may have just been very lucky so far. Refresh rates are great, playing Valorant, CSGO, and Apex hasn't been an issue. Losing gun fights in any of those games have been my own fault and not having hardware lag behind and my reactions not being able to quickly adjust.If you aren't playing competitive games and are more looking for a media consumption tool or prioritize picture quality and color accuracy this probably won't be the panel for you. There are better options out there for that specific purpose but if you like to game and consume content this is a great bang for the buck monitor.1 small gripe I would have, but I understand for the price point it can't really be helped is that the monitor stand that comes with it isn't height adjustable.Not a big deal if you are planning on Vesa mounting it but something worth noting.Also if you are planning on using this monitor and having sound out there are no on board speakers. Not an issue if you are planning on using headphones or have desk speakers but I have seen other reviews saying they were disappointed at the lack of them. So i figure I'd point that out if you were expecting them.Overall for I'd recommend this monitor to anyone who needs a great budget gaming monitor. Like I said just make sure to double check your settings, on the monitor and on your PC, when you first plug it in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Clean Moniter
reviews.reviewText: This is the 27’ inch curved moniter, and it it honestly super clean and responsive. I love the graphics and how easy it is to setup. picture quality is so clear. no built in speaker but ill just buy some.overall 8/10👍🏼
Ya this monitor is great, the colours are beautiful very rich. Finally getting 144+ frames and being able to see them is dope. Buying a 2nd one as well.
Cero quejas, funciona a la perfección después de 2 meses de uso constante
We purchased as a replacement as our old monitor had broken. This was the right price, it works well and the display is decent.

Si eres tan estúpido como yo podrías cometer el mismo error, esto es un ⚠️MONITOR⚠️, por lo que no tiene bocinas ni viene para conercarte unas, solo sirve para dar vídeo, si buscas algo como una TV económica no lo compres, eso sería todo, al final me las arreglé pero eso, Paz. 😽✌️

Needed a “quick & dirty” replacement for the vga monitor in my workshop. For the price, this thing is really impressive. I particularly like the fact that it isn’t shutting itself off every two seconds like my old one was! 😉
